remarks: Transfer a relation subset law to the function relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caofref.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.

caofrss $p |- ( ph -> ( F oR R G -> F oR T G ) ) $.
